attributes.action: Ban Heavy Goods Vehicles in the outside lane of Dual Carriageways or 2 lane Motorways
attributes.additional_details: We, the private or business travelling car drivers, are totally fed up with HGV's/Articulated lorries overtaking each other on 2 lane highways/Motorways. These selfish manoeuvres often block the overtaking lane for miles for the sake of less than 1 extra HGV mile per hour. Ban them and our journeys would be much quicker and theirs would be almost the same
